TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit HyperLinkDesigner extends System.Web.UI.Design.TextControlDesigner

summary.span: 在可视化设计器中为 Web 服务器控件提供设计时支持。

span.span: Provides design-time support in a visual designer for the Web server control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控件创建客户端浏览器导航到另一个 Web 页的链接。The control creates a link for the client browser to navigate to another Web page. 在可视化设计器中，当从源视图切换到设计视图中，标记源代码描述控件进行分析，并在设计图面上创建控件的设计时版本。In a visual designer, when you switch from Source to Design view, the markup source code that describes a control is parsed and a design-time version of the control is created on the design surface. 当你切换回源视图时，设计时控件的标记源代码持久保存，并编辑向网页上的标记。When you switch back to Source view, the design-time control is persisted to the markup source code and edited into the markup for the Web page. 类提供设计时支持控件。The class provides design-time support for the control. 方法返回用于呈现关联的标记控件在设计时。The method returns the markup that is used to render the associated control at design time. 到关联的控件的更改时调用方法。The method is called when there is a change to the associated control. ## Examples 本部分包含两个代码示例。This section contains two code examples. 第一个代码示例演示如何从派生类类，请重写一个方法，并提供一个属性值。The first one demonstrates how to derive a class from the class, override a method, and supply a property value. 第二个代码示例演示如何派生控件从控件并将特性应用对派生的控件。The second one demonstrates how to derive a control from the control and apply an attribute on the derived control. 下面的代码示例演示如何从`CustomHyperLinkDesigner`类类。The following code example shows how to derive a `CustomHyperLinkDesigner` class from the class. 它将重写方法提供的默认值属性，如果原始值，则为为空字符串 ("")。It overrides the method to supply a default value for the property if the original value for the is an empty string (""). 这可确保的关联的控件将会显示在设计时。This ensures that the associated control will be visible at design time. [!code-csharp[HyperLinkDesigner_Resubmit#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HyperLinkDesigner_Resubmit/CS/CustomHyperLinkDesigner.cs#1)] [!code-vb[HyperLinkDesigner_Resubmit#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HyperLinkDesigner_Resubmit/VB/customhyperlinkdesigner.vb#1)] 下面的代码示例演示如何从`CustomHyperLink`控件从控制并且应用属性`CustomHyperLink`控件与之相关`CustomHyperLinkDesigner`。The following code example shows how to derive the `CustomHyperLink` control from the control and apply a attribute on the `CustomHyperLink` control to associate it with the `CustomHyperLinkDesigner`. [!code-csharp[HyperLinkDesigner_Resubmit#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HyperLinkDesigner_Resubmit/CS/CustomHyperLink.cs#3)] [!code-vb[HyperLinkDesigner_Resubmit#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HyperLinkDesigner_Resubmit/VB/customhyperlink.vb#3)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks .NET Framework 内部构造的新实例类时创建关联控件或一份设计图面上的控件。The .NET Framework internally constructs a new instance of the class when it creates the associated control or a copy of the control on the design surface.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance string GetDesignTimeHtml() cil managed
Public Overrides Function GetDesignTimeHtml () As String

summary.span: 获取用于在设计时呈现关联控件的标记。

span.span: Gets the markup that is used to render the associated control at design time.

returns.span: 包含用于在设计时呈现关联的超链接控件的标记的字符串。

span.span: A string containing the markup used to render the associated hyperlink control at design time.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法生成关联的设计时标记控件。The method generates the design-time markup for the associated control. 该方法首先保存的本地副本， ，和属性，以及子集合。The method first saves local copies of the , , and properties, as well as the child collection. 它提供了默认值为这些属性的原始值是否`null`或空白。It provides default values for these properties if the original values are `null` or blank. 方法然后调用基方法来生成标记并将属性和子控件集合恢复为其原始值，如有必要。The method then calls the base method to generate the markup and restores the properties and child control collection to their original values, if necessary. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何从`CustomHyperLinkDesigner`类类。The following code example shows how to derive the `CustomHyperLinkDesigner` class from the class. 它将重写方法提供的默认值属性，如果原始值，则为为空字符串 ("")。It overrides the method to supply a default value for the property if the original value for is an empty string (""). 这可确保的关联的控件将会显示在设计时。This ensures that the associated control will be visible at design time. 此代码示例摘自更大的示例为提供类。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-csharp[HyperLinkDesigner_Resubmit#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HyperLinkDesigner_Resubmit/CS/CustomHyperLinkDesigner.cs#1)] [!code-vb[HyperLinkDesigner_Resubmit#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HyperLinkDesigner_Resubmit/VB/customhyperlinkdesigner.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public override void OnComponentChanged (object sender, System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentChangedEventArgs ce);
.method public hidebysig virtual instance void OnComponentChanged(object sender, class System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentChangedEventArgs ce) cil managed
Public Overrides Sub OnComponentChanged (sender As Object, ce As ComponentChangedEventArgs)
public: override void OnComponentChanged(System::Object ^ sender, System::ComponentModel::Design::ComponentChangedEventArgs ^ ce);

span.span: The object that is the source of the event.

param.name: ce
param.span: 包含事件数据的 对象。

span.span: A object that contains the event data.

summary.span: 当关联的控件更改时调用。

span.span: Called when there is a change to the associated control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法调用时关联的事件引发控件。The method is called when the event of the associated control is raised. 通常，这是为了响应在控件上的属性更改 (例如，**属性**网格更改)。Typically, this is in response to a property change on the control (for example, a **Properties** grid change). 创建对象，然后调用基方法。The creates a object, and then calls the base method.
